title: Radical
description:
Kerri Kenney-Silver, Peter Kim, Kevin Allison, Christine Gentry, and Shiny share stories about car wrecks, poop mishaps, fist fights, animal carcasses and cannibalism.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Carolyn Leonhart, Robert Smith, Peter Kim, Parquet Courts, This Is My Body by Shiny, Yancy & Little Praise Party, Kerri Kenney-Silver, The Juju Orchestra, Christine Gentry, Kevin Allison)
